name: Indiana Homestead
text: Ordered a $5 Cheese pizza.   More than enough for 1 person.  No flavor on my crust, but you can choose different flavors.  Crust is perfectly browned and dusted with cornmeal.  Very yummy.

name: Kitty Khaos
text: The cashier Kevin was awesome! He was very polite and helpful. The food was amazing and well worth the price. Very happy with my experience! :)

name: Rolluxus
text: Great food! Excellent service! Very fast the staff is very polite very helpful 10/10 would recommend!

name: Randy Michael
text: I recieved fast courteous service with a smile.  1st time with a smile. My pizza was made on point. She deserves a big thank you. 10PM-1030p.

name: Anthony Gootee
text: The pizza here was good. We tried it with their ranch-flavored crust but it was too much! Next time we go we'll have to try another flavor.

name: marknox
text: When they get busy (On a Tuesday night?) they don't answer the phone for take-out orders. Instead, you're subjected to an irritating ad that repeats over and over. After  hearing it 5 times I gve up. Went with Pizza Hut instead.

name: Aaron Lecklider
text: Great price for great pizza.

name: Rachel Wooten
text: The best is the 3 cheeser pleaser with asiago crust. And I just found out they have Subs.

name: Erin
text: Everything was over cooked. Couldn't eat the bread because of how hard it was. The pizza was also ridiculously soggy. I used to get hungry Howie's up in Michigan and was excited when I found one around Indy. I was not impressed.

name: S Holmes
text: Great pizza at a great price. Pizza deals make it affordable to feed a family.

name: David Tessereau
text: If you want the best pizza then go  to Hungry Howie‚Äôs they have the best and the service is always awesome.  üëç 25 years and still going back

name: Chad Christensen
text: I worked for Hungry Howie's in Michigan so I still have good memories about the pizzas

name: Sleepy Heals
text: I love their Howie rolls and their subs and their pizza. Haven't tried their wings yet but I will when there is a deal. I've had a problem once or twice but I talked to the GM and they were very understanding. I will continue to order from here.

name: Rachel Shepherd
text: Normally the people here are very friendly, however calling in just not the guy that answered was being very rude. When I called, I was laughing, he got short and proceeded to go "what do you want" After rushing me through my order, not ‚Ä¶More

name: Tracye Childress
text: Omgoodness, if you love pizza and you love asiago bagels you gotta try Hungry Howie's asiago pizza crust on your next pizza night! üî• Also, the guy working, Keith was very pleasant and professional and had the store in pristine condition! Highly recommendedüëçüëç

name: Brian Williams
text: Really good pizza, and fast friendly service.

name: B G
text: Would love to take the girl that took my order out. She was super nice and everything was good

name: Dawn Woods
text: Great food for a great price!

name: Kevin Urkel
text: From one Kevin to another the service and Pizza were great!!

name: Robin O'Dear
text: Very unhappy with Service tonight. Not sure what the problem was. But I was told my order would be ready in 20 minutes & it wasn't ready for pick up until an hour later.

name: jenn arrowood
text: always have enjoyed Hungry Howie's! 25 years of great food.

name: Youme Devin
text: They just delivered so fast , and the guy was super nice and i forgot to thank him.  10/10

name: Damon Huddleston
text: I love the name and great food

name: Heather Ratcliff
text: Pretty decent pizza and breadsticks. First time trying it. I'd heard good things.  I think maybe I would have liked thin crust better.  But I'd eat it again.

name: Cc C
text: I've ordered here multiple times. Pizza is always great. Customer service could be better. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer Herring
text: Wonderful customer service! Mike is the best! Always wonderful experience even just grab some great eats.

name: Mrs Officer
text: Apparently they don't deliver to Franklin township anymore... even though there is a store on Thompson rd?

name: Lauren Fulmer
text: I just called to place an order and the kid who answered the phone was so rude, I cancelled my order. I‚Äôm very disappointed because I was really looking forward to the pizza! I will never order from them again!!!  No, Howard, I will not give you another chance, sorry! You MUST get a friendly staff to keep business!!

name: Kelton Newman
text: I like the casual, laidback airs of this location. I like the people at this location. I like the food.

name: black rainbow
text: The boneless asian wings are fantastic and the stuffed crust pizza was one of the best pizzas I have had.

name: Jama Bernard
text: Yummy food and great service

name: Booze Tube
text:
1 hour and 22 minutes later, still no pizza. Not ok. Not ok.

Edit. Pizza came around the 1hour 25 min mark. Tepid but at least it's good. Seriously though?

name: Kevin Kramp
text: Waiting 90 minutes for a pizza is absolutely ridiculous!!!! Most terrible service Ive ever had for pizza delivery. We are still waiting! What are they doing over there?!!!

name: cody hampton
text: It's one my favourite pizza places, great flavored crusts and they cook it right each time. Never have I had an undercooked pizza from them.

name: Gray Family
text: Personal hygiene is a must if your making food. I came in to pick up my pizza and the lady had the dirtiest nails I've seen. I hoped she wasn't the one making our pizza but the whole time I stood there I never saw another person in the ‚Ä¶More

name: Cyndi Sparkles
text: I love the flavored crust and the amount of cheese. Oh. My. Goodness. Oh so yummy. And friendly people working there too.

name: PixieDancer
text: Salads are good but too small

name: Daisy Daswani
text: Absolutely amazing in every aspect.

name: Tena Harnish
text: I just Tried to order a pizza and have been told that they‚Äôre not allowed to come to my address anymore because the last time I ordered a pizza with them they never delivered it so they told us they were going to give us a free pizza so we went up there and got it but now I try to call back and I am banned how Petty !!

name: Bailey Moore
text: good food mane

name: daniel rasmussen
text: Pizza was timely. Ordered large Asian. Very few toppings. Many bites of just crust. Very sparse chicken and green peppers. Good flavor.

name: Nieshia Bell
text: Good person pan pizza.

name: zach S
text: Great pizza

name: steelgiant8
text: Quickest pizza delivery I've witnessed AND it has a lot of flavor. The Cajun bread is good too.

name: Courtney Lewis
text: Ordered two pizzas around 11:43 AM so by time it gets here its lunch time, and it said it would be a 45 minute wait. It is now 1:25 and haven't gotten our delivery yet. Trying to call and get ahold of them and no answer. Keep getting hung ‚Ä¶More

name: Joseph Campbell
text: came in tonight walked in wasn't barely 20 minute wait lady was very friendly and helpful the pizza was amazing the bread was good and the prices I saw you couldn't beat wish they had you around more of Indianapolis I think you guys would do amazing.

name: Jeremy Richards
text: Horrible pizza!! The last 2 times we ordered from here, it has been cold and dry like it had been sitting for hours. This will be the last time we order from this place.

name: Dennis Craig III
text: Don't even deserve a star. Rude and super mouthy when asking for a delivery, and hung up in a middle of a question.

name: Stephanie King
text: Quick service even when slammed

name: Melissa McKinney
text: Their pizza is subpar at best. Bad customer service.  The owner is a homophobic prick.

name: Ben P
text: Never step foot in this place, even to take a piss. Took my delivery order 4.3 miles a way. Then decided to call me 45 minutes later to tell me they don't deliver to me. Thanks no thanks.

name: Dee R.
text: Fast service  mouth watering pizzas,  subs. And the crust is so good

name: Emilie Elliott
text: Since I've had 2 bad experiences at this Hungry Howies, I thought it warranted a review. The first time I ordered delivery, took an hour and fifteen minutes which isn't that bad for lunch time I guess but anyways, the pizza arrives and the ‚Ä¶More

name: Hannah Bell
text: I ordered ONE cheese pizza. I've been waiting over an hour and a half. I'm still waiting at this moment. Called and I'm on hold and have been for 20 minutes. The first time I called I sat on there and got hung up on. I'm PISSED and want money back!! Im obviously not getting my food and there's no way to get a hold of them!!!

name: Jill Rangel
text: Great food and service. They were short staffed and still did a great job!

name: L T
text: Awesome pizza! Fast delivery.  Staff always courteous and nice!

name: Katherine Poteet
text: This place has awesome food for delivery or carry out. This is not a sit down and eat

name: noneyo klotzner
text: They have some of the most awesome pizza around love the Cajun crust mmmm good

text: Not well advertised but their pizza is good! Staff was friendly. Location is next to a nail spa so my kids get pizza and I get a pedicure! Lol
